FuncDef: The display bgp link-state unicast update-peer-group command displays information about update peer-groups.
CLIs: display bgp link-state unicast update-peer-group [ index <update-group-index> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of an update peer-group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: The Link-state Unicast instance's update peer group number : 1
Keep buffer update peer group number : 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp link-state unicast update-peer-group verbose command displays details about update peer-groups of BGP components in the current system.
